title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression on row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0', the bug causes the system to return an incorrect data set result or a null result set.
OB: The bug causes the system to return the first result record when previewing the data set, instead of an empty result set as expected.
EB: The system should generate the 'row[0]' value only after all the data has been fetched, and it should not be considered as a valid filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Set a filter on the data set using the expression 'row[0] equals to 0'.
2. Click on the Preview tab. The system will return the first record, but it should return an empty result.
